actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from U.S. Postal Service.

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a stamp to commemorate the late Glenn Miller, the acclaimed Big Band leader of the 1930's and 1940's.

summary.text: Provides for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp to honor the contributions to American music of Glenn Miller. Directs that such stamp be placed on sale on March 1, 1984, the 80th anniversary of his birth.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a stamp to commemorate the late Glenn Miller, the acclaimed Big Band leader of the 1930's and 1940's.
